item.description:
Come one come all to Improv Boston where you organizers: Sandy, Ben, Barbara and maybe Jason?? will be trying their hand, (making their debut) in the forum of Sketchprov. As the name gives away it is a combination of Improv and Sketch Comedy. No we've never done it before. Yes, we thrilled. We'd be happier if you were in the audience. Link to SketchHaus
Hope to see you there!

Directions:

By the T
ImprovBoston is conveniently located just a few hundred feet from the
Central Square T station. Take the Red Line to Central Square Station.
Walk north on Prospect Street past the Starbucks and The Field (an
Irish Pub). ImprovBoston is about 200 feet from the corner of Prospect
St. and Mass Ave. on the right.

From 93 Northbound/Southbound
Take the Storrow Drive exit towards Cambridge. Continue on Storrow
Drive to Mass Ave. Make a right on Mass Ave (the only way you can go)
and drive across the bridge into Cambridge. Go past MIT and through
Central Square to Prospect St. Make a right on Propsect St.
ImprovBoston is about 200 feet from the intersection of Mass Ave. and
Prospect St. on the right.

From Mass Pike (Rte. 90)
Take the Cambridge/Allston exit. Stay to the right as you exit and
follow the road over the bridge into Cambridge. Continue straight on
River Street through Central Square (crossing Mass Ave.). River Street
now becomes Prospect Street. ImprovBoston about 200 feet from the
intersection of Mass Ave. and Prospect St. on the right.

Parking:
Central Square has ample parking (metered spaces, public lots, a City
garage), but can get congested, especially on weekends, so leave
yourself 20-30 minutes to find a space. There is metered parking
($0.25 / half hour until 6 PM Monday - Saturday) on most of the
streets surrounding ImprovBoston. Do NOT park in residential spaces
(except on Sundays) or you will be certainly ticketed and possibly
towed. There are three public lots (metered parking at $0.25 / half
hour until 6 PM Monday - Saturday) accessible from Bishop Allen Dr.
The lot near Douglass St. is the largest. The Green Street Garage has
the largest number of spaces and offers very reasonable rates (open 24
hours, $1 / hour, daily maximum $13, $5 night rate).
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the stage performing :-) If you are in the audience then I hope you'll be able to find us.
item.why: Watch you organizers at work in a venue other then the 4th floor of the porter exchange, as we attempt to make you laugh.
item.name: SketchProv @ SketchHaus 3/7
